title: Best of the Program | Guests: Peter Schweizer & Rabbi Yitzchok Adlerstein | 3/24/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the media manipulation of Glenn’s book, “The Great Reset.” Author Peter Schweizer joins to discuss Hunter Biden’s laptop, a possible indictment of Hunter Biden, and the corruption that led to President Biden being compromised. Founding editor of Cross-Currents Rabbi Yitzchok Adlerstein joins to discuss what’s happening in Ukraine and the four rungs of anti-Semitism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
